help:
ğŸ“š Available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/weather [city] - Current weather
/forecast [city] - 5-day forecast
/history - Request history
/favorites - Manage favorite cities
/add_fav [city] - Add to favorites
/remove_fav [city] - Remove from favorites
/language - Change language
/help - Help

Examples:
/weather Moscow
/add_fav Paris
/forecast London
favorites_empty:
You don't have any favorite cities yet.
Add them with /add_fav [city] or via button in weather forecast.
